content.summary: Senior Software Tester with 9 years of experience and expertise in software testing, possessing strong leadership skills and a proven track record of achieving efficiency improvements and quality enhancements. Has client-facing experience in Poland.

experience.title: Senior Software Testing Engineer
responsibilities: Implementing industry-leading policies, processes, and best practices to achieve a 20% increase in efficiency.
Delivering structured mentoring, guidance, and training resulting in a 30% reduction in onboarding time.
Coordinating and providing hands-on support during user and pre-production testing phases.
Spearheading meticulous review processes of User Stories, Definition of Ready (DOR), and Definition of Done (DOD).
Taking charge of test scenarios/scripts preparation, peer review, and BA's review.
Facilitating and driving scrum meetings such as Sprint Review.
Conducting informative demo sessions on the latest developed functionalities.
Conducting thorough reviews of test automation execution plans.
Creating and maintaining requirement matrices with a 100% accuracy rate.
Assuming complete ownership of assigned modules, delivering with maximum efficiency.

experience.title: Associate
responsibilities: Orchestrating the implementation of industry-leading policies, processes, and best practices to achieve a 20% increase in efficiency.
Delivering structured mentoring, guidance, and training resulting in a 30% reduction in onboarding time for new team members.
Coordinating and providing hands-on support during user and pre-production testing phases, leading to a 15% reduction in defect leakage.
Spearheading meticulous review processes of User Stories, Definition of Ready (DOR), and Definition of Done (DOD), achieving a 90% compliance rate.
Taking charge of test scenarios/scripts preparation, peer review, and BA's review, leading to a 20% reduction in defect escape rate and ensuring a 100% sign-off rate before deployment.

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Graduated from RKDF Institute of Science u0026 Technology, Bhopal in 2014 with a Bachelor of Engineering.
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Displayed leadership by spearheading meticulous review processes and facilitating scrum meetings.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Led a team, delivered structured mentoring, guidance, and training, resulting in efficiency improvements and quality enhancements.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effectively bridged communication gaps with clients during onshore client-facing experience.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Achieved a 20% increase in efficiency, a 30% reduction in onboarding time for new team members, and a 95% adherence to project timelines and quality standards.
